-Kk6r1J38DgbxAxA0opE.creator: Ground Control
-Kk6r1J38DgbxAxA0opE.info:
This upcoming Saturday we our hosting another Cars and Coffee, at World Of Speed, anyone is invited to join us!

Attending Portland Cars & Coffee is an experience in itself and one no gear head should miss if they’re rolling through the Portland area.  Our staff of “Ground Control” volunteers have graciously given their time and effort to make sure Cars & Coffee is here to stay.
Portland Cars & Coffee was started with the intent of being all-inclusive, respectful, and having a good time Saturday mornings with friends & family.
-Kk6r1J38DgbxAxA0opE.title: Cars and Coffee at World of Speed

-Kk9UUQrjLvV0Z85uNdP.creator: P.I.R
-Kk9UUQrjLvV0Z85uNdP.info:
Come on out and join us this night and grudge race some of the local Police Chiefs at Portland International Raceway. We will be out there with our cars and to show support for the great cause that the Oregon Beat the Heat organization has put towards " The Krystal Pomante Scholarship fund" and the effort in keeping the late night drags open for all racers. 

The event is being sponsored by Extreme Turbo Systems and they will be having some prizes for this night. We look forward to having a great attendance for this event.
-Kk9UUQrjLvV0Z85uNdP.title: P.I.R Event "Beat the Heat"

-Kk9VgJNu8NHFl6SczWy.creator: Jim Strongburg
-Kk9VgJNu8NHFl6SczWy.info:
A FREE EVENT FOR SPECTATORS
NO REGISTRATION REQUIRED FOR VEHICLES
People start showing up at 6:00am milling around and finding a spot to hang all day!
OUR FOOD DONATION BOOTHS OPEN AT 10AM.
It’s a all day event! Come early and stay late!
Have fun and drive safe!
-Kk9VgJNu8NHFl6SczWy.title: Cruise The Gut
